addContactToMailingList.description: Add contacts to your mailing lists.

addTagToContact.description: Apply a tag to a contact by email. Creates the tag if it doesn't exist.

addUpdateContact.description: Add a new contact or update an existing one. Confirmation email sent based on mailing list settings.

cloneCampaign.description: Clone an existing campaign, optionally renaming.

createCampaign.description: Create a new campaign with campaign name, subject, topic, sender name/address, and mailing list.

findCampaign.description: Locate an existing campaign by campaign name.

findContact.description: Look up an existing contact by email address.

removeTag.description: Remove a tag from a contact.

sendCampaign.description: Send a campaign that has been created or cloned.

unsubscribeContact.description: Remove a contact from a mailing list.

newCampaign.description: Fires when a new campaign is created.

newContact.description: Fires when a new contact is added to a selected mailing list.

unsubscribe.description: Fires when a contact is removed from a mailing list or unsubscribed.
